Description: Avoid unnecessary constructors - the compiler will generate these for you
Private field 'firstChannel' could be made final; it is only initialized in the declaration or constructor.
Perhaps 'soundPlayer' could be replaced by a local variable.
Avoid excessively long variable names like changeAssociationAction
Avoid catching NullPointerException; consider removing the cause of the NPE.
